Hello!

I'm Dean, and this is my little home on the web

What's all this then?

A little place track my stuff. I've tried to add as much content I own as possible to the site. It may not be pretty, or finished or supported; but if I built it, it'll be here somewhere.

A little place to help others. Found something you liked, something that helped, something you couldn't understand? Hit me up on Twitter or open an issue on Github; lets chat.
